milestones.description: Launched global operations, expanding trading access to over 100 countries.
Rolled out next-generation MT5 platform with advanced charting and real-time data.
Achieved USD 1 billion in executed trade volume across all asset classes.
Introduced zero-commission accounts and ultra-tight spreads starting from 0.1 pips.
Secured multi-jurisdictional regulation and enhanced fund-segregation protocols globally.
Expanded product suite to 500+ instruments, including shares, indices and commodities.
Launched institutional partner & white-label programs to amplify global brokerage reach.
Introduced USD 1 million excess-loss insurance per account for enhanced client security.
Established 24/5 multilingual support with live assistance across continents.
Surpassed 25,000 active trading accounts and marked 15 years of service excellence.
